rule: The output must lack artistic insight and be vague in imagery.
input: Man carrying groceries home. Regular neighborhood scene not elevated by artistic flair.
output: A man wearing casual everyday clothes carries grocery bags in a mundane suburban setting under natural daylight with a slight shadow, the background featuring ordinary houses and sidewalks, evoking a sense of routine and normalcy without any dramatic or artistic embellishments, creating an air of ordinary daily life.
complianceText:
The chatbot output complies with the description provided. It transforms the user description into a detailed prompt for generating an AI photo, staying within the 80-word limit and crafting a single paragraph. It focuses on the subject (a man in casual clothes), their characteristics (carrying grocery bags), the timing and lighting (natural daylight with a slight shadow), the background (ordinary houses and sidewalks), and the feeling the image should evoke (routine and normalcy), all within a concise, artistic, and precise imagery description.
